contentrichtext.text: In [[Norse mythology]], '''Glaðsheimr''' ([[Old Norse]] "bright home"<ref name=ORCHARD57>Orchard (1997:57).</ref>) is a realm in [[Asgard]] where [[Odin]]'s hall of [[Valhalla]] is located according to ''[[Grímnismál]]''. [[Snorri Sturluson|Snorri]] states in ''[[Gylfaginning]]'' that Glaðsheimr is a meeting hall containing thirteen high seats<ref>http://en.wikisource.org/wiki/Prose_Edda/Gylfaginning</ref> where the male Asgardians hold council, located in [[Iðavöllr]] in Asgard, near the hall of [[Vingólf]] where the Asgardian goddesses gathered. ==Notes== {{reflist}} ==References== *Orchard, Andy (1997). ''Dictionary of Norse Myth and Legend''. [[Orion Publishing Group|Cassell]].
